Articles.Content: Another Sunshine Stater here! I've played around on KSP for a while, but just very basic designs and very little technique. I'm looking forward to learning from everyone here. I've skimmed around the forum a bit already and learned a lot in a short period of time!
Welcome aboard! You should head to youtube! Lots of great ksp content there! Lots to learn!
Thanks! I've watched a ton of Scott Manley's videos, but I think it's time to branch out to some other users too!
Welcome on board! Youll be at home here in notime. Godspeed!
Welcome. I learned how to build SSTO's here wich don't even crash!
Thanks for the warm welcome everyone I'm excited to be here!
